Translations.Text: aparaadhisakalara paraicaya poraa yaba sihamtara laksanara dbaraa, tara pichata sihamtara agaculi arau bharaita dharai tani niya ha’ba
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
e'itorae'i se'i jahannama, yaka aparaadhisakale asbikara karaichila
Sihamta jahannamara ju'i arau utala panira majata ghurai thakiba
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
arau yiye tara pratipalakara sanmukhata upasthita horaara bhaya posana karae, tara babe ache duta jannata
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
ubhaye'i bahu phala sakhabisista
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
Ubhaya jannatata ache prabahamana duta nijaraa
eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
ubhayara majata ache pratyeka phala du'i du'i prakara
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
tata sihamte a'uji bahiba enekuraa bichanata yara abhyantarabhaga ha'ba sinkhaperae tairai sukomala; arau ubhaya jannatara phala-mula thakiba nikatararti
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
tata thakiba sbamira prati drsti simitakarai raupahisakala, yisakalaka itipurbe kono manuhe athaba kono jine sparsa karaa na'i
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
sihamta yeniba hiraa arau mukuta
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
uttama kamara pratidana uttamara bahirae arau ki ha’ba parae
eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
arau se'i duta jannatara bahirae'o arau duta jannata ache
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
jannata duta haiche ghana se'i'ujiya
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
e'i duta jannatata ache ucchalita duta nijaraa
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
